title: Giants Clean House, Gronk Suspension, MVP Race (Football 12/06)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora react to the Giants firing head coach Ben McAdoo and general manager Jerry Reese, then discuss the future of those positions and Eli Manning in New York. Nick, Pete and Jason cover Rob Gronkowski's suspension, dirty play in Steelers vs. Bengals, and play 'Hot Take or Just Right' featuring statements like, "the Cowboys are going to make the playoffs," "there will be at least 8 head coaching vacancies this offseason," and more. Then, they wrap up by previewing and picking Thursday Night Football between the Saints and Falcons.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
